name: Gloom Stalker
description: Masters of the dark, Gloom Stalkers ambush foes from the shadows.

3.name: Gloom Stalker Magic
3.description: Gain additional spells such as disguise self and rope trick at higher levels.

3.name: Dread Ambusher
3.description: Gain bonus to initiative, extra speed on the first turn, and an extra attack that deals +1d8 damage.

3.name: Umbral Sight
3.description: Gain darkvision or extend it and become invisible to creatures relying on darkvision while in darkness.

7.name: Iron Mind
7.description: Gain proficiency in Wisdom saving throws, or in Intelligence or Charisma if already proficient.

11.name: Stalker's Flurry
11.description: Once per turn when you miss a weapon attack, make another attack.

15.name: Shadowy Dodge
15.description: Use your reaction to impose disadvantage on an attack against you if the attacker doesn't have advantage.
